subject: Product Question, Ground Wire
description_text:
Hi,

I have recently purchased and received the Plus X Pedal set and VAM Pro
modules. I am trying to install the grounding wire to the control box,
however, it seems the rivet where the arrow points to is installed too
tightly to the box, and I cannot slot the ground wire tab under it. What is
the solution from here? Can I install it some other way? I was not provided
with a tool that is compatible with the head on that rivet/bolt, I cannot
make it looser.

conversations.body_text: Hi Smithies Smith,     You can use an Allen wrench to loosen the screw. Other positions can also be used for grounding, but make sure to scrape off a small area of the black oxide layer, otherwise the grounding connection may not be effective.
